propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.exclusive: If true, only allow one of the child ToggleButton values to be selected.
propDescriptions.value: The currently selected value within the group or an array of selected values when exclusive is false. The value must have reference equality with the option in order to be selected.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

vertical.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

groupedHorizontal.description: Styles applied to the children if {{conditions}}.

groupedVertical.description: Styles applied to the children if {{conditions}}.
